item.title: How do i change my look on moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Slain Slain
item.description:
@Slain wrote:

Well I awnsered this on another post, as for npc’s dc’ing you after “Talking” is basically becuase theres nothing written for that npc so the servers like “wtf? this guys nuts” and dc’s you, for the fact the server has no action to do. Consider it like a black hole.
